categories: Category:Commission for the Preservation of the New Order personnel
Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Tian Karmiya was a female individual who served in the Imperial Navy of the Galactic Empire. Karmiya studied at the Carida Academy, where she received prime marks. However, she was rumored to have reported two students with better grades for selling their exam answers, resulting in their expulsion, while she was rewarded with a place in a merit society. Following the academy, Karmiya served aboard the Enigma and Victory at Batonn with fine service. Karmiya eventually obtained the military rank of commander, and served as executive officer aboard the Ultimatum of Death Squadron.
